option.od: print the help message and exit.
the input file is a map format file.
filename of the cnvmap format file. If this is omitted, the file will be read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Supersample a convection map file in time.

description.p: Supersample a convection map file in time.
The task supersamples by skipping over records in the output file for a fixed length of time. By default the task will write a record every 10 minutes

example.description: Supersample the map format file "20040830.map" to produce the file "20040830.map.s".
